Uses of Class
jMEF.PVectorMatrix

    • Uses of PVectorMatrix in jMEF

      Methods in jMEF that return PVectorMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Eta2Lambda(PVectorMatrix H)
      Converts expectation parameters to source parameters.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.gradF(PVectorMatrix T)
      Computes \f$ \nabla F ( \mathbf{\Theta} )\f$.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.gradG(PVectorMatrix H)
      Computes \f$ \nabla G (\mathbf{H})\f$
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Lambda2Eta(PVectorMatrix L)
      Converts source parameters to expectation parameters.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Lambda2Theta(PVectorMatrix L)
      Converts source parameters to natural parameters.
      PVectorMatrix PVectorMatrix.Minus(Parameter v2m2)
      Subtracts (not in place) the vector-matrix \f$ (v_2, m_2) \f$ to the current vector-matrix \f$ (v_1, m_1) \f$.
      PVectorMatrix PVectorMatrix.Plus(Parameter v2m2)
      Adds (not in place) the current vector-matrix \f$ (v_1, m_1) \f$ to the vector-matrix \f$ (v_2, m_2) \f$.
      static PVectorMatrix PVectorMatrix.RandomDistribution(int dim)
      Generates a random vector-matrix \f$ (v,m) \f$ such as \f$ m \f$ is a positive definite matrix.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.t(PVector x)
      Computes the sufficient statistic \f$ t(x)\f$.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Theta2Lambda(PVectorMatrix T)
      Converts natural parameters to source parameters.
      PVectorMatrix PVectorMatrix.Times(double lambda)
      Multiplies (not in place) the current vector-matrix \f$ (v,m) \f$ by a real number \f$ \lambda \f$.
      Methods in jMEF with parameters of type PVectorMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double MultivariateGaussian.density(PVector x, PVectorMatrix param)
      Computes the density value \f$ f(x;\mu,\Sigma) \f$.
      PVector MultivariateGaussian.drawRandomPoint(PVectorMatrix L)
      Draws a point from the considered distribution.
      static boolean PVectorMatrix.equals(PVectorMatrix v1m1, PVectorMatrix v2m2)
      Verifies if two vector-matrices \f$ (v_1 , m_1) \f$ and \f$ (v_2 , m_2) \f$ are similar.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Eta2Lambda(PVectorMatrix H)
      Converts expectation parameters to source parameters.
      double MultivariateGaussian.F(PVectorMatrix T)
      Computes the log normalizer \f$ F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) \f$.
      double MultivariateGaussian.G(PVectorMatrix H)
      Computes \f$ G(\mathbf{H})\f$
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.gradF(PVectorMatrix T)
      Computes \f$ \nabla F ( \mathbf{\Theta} )\f$.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.gradG(PVectorMatrix H)
      Computes \f$ \nabla G (\mathbf{H})\f$
      double MultivariateGaussian.KLD(PVectorMatrix LP, PVectorMatrix LQ)
      Computes the Kullback-Leibler divergence between two multivariate Gaussian distributions.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Lambda2Eta(PVectorMatrix L)
      Converts source parameters to expectation parameters.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Lambda2Theta(PVectorMatrix L)
      Converts source parameters to natural parameters.
      PVectorMatrix MultivariateGaussian.Theta2Lambda(PVectorMatrix T)
      Converts natural parameters to source parameters.
